original_text: Seven weeks shalt thou number unto thee: begin to number the seven weeks from such time as thou beginnest to put the sickle to the corn.
korean_text: 일곱 주를 셀지니 곡식에 낫을 대는 첫 날부터 일곱 주를 세어

sentences.original_text: Seven weeks shalt thou number unto thee:
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 칠 주를 너를 위하여 계수할지니라

sentences.original_text: begin to number the seven weeks
from such time as thou beginnest
to put the sickle to the corn.
